subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Orlando Pace, a seven-time Pro Bowl offensive tackle, was released by the St. Louis Rams, clearing $6 million in cap space. Pace, 33, started 14 games last season, but missed half of 2007 and almost all of 2006 with injuries. He was the first overall pick of the 1997 draft. pace.
